Name: X Wars Deluxe
About the game: Liberate your people! Defeat evil! Conquer the 4 armies in this Turn Based Strategy masterpiece ;) Features Advance in Dozens of campaign missions! Dozens of multiplayer maps (2 Players and 4 Players). Online and Local Multiplayer. Lots of Units to Build and Control. A story that if made a movie would get 11+ Oscars! The Units From Foot Soldiers to Tanks, Helicopters, Jets, Submarines, Ships. A huge arsenal to choose from. Build your units and achieve victory! The Story 4 Big armies in conflict. Embark in an emotive story about love and... war.
